page.title: 08EDUCATION 2
page.content:
When they are 11 years old children from Ormsgill Junior School usually go to the Alfred Barrow{Secondary}School near the town centre. Children from St. Pius usually go to St. Bernard's R.C. Secondary School, which serves the whole town.
At 16 they can all go to the{Sixth {Form College}if they want to stay at school, because it is for the whole town too.
Walney Island has a{Nursery}school, two Infant & three Junior schools, an R.C. Primary school and its own Secondary School.
There is a{Nursery}class in Ormsgill Infant School, and a{Social Services {Day Nursery.}
